annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 16-137, in par. (a)(6), substituted “;” for “; or”; in par. (a)(7), deleted “(choice of law)” following “§ 46-306.04”, substituted “alleged arrearages” for “arrearages”, and substituted “; or” for a period; and added par. (a)(8).

annoGroup.heading: Effective Dates
annoGroup.annotation: Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: “This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007.”

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 607 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
